issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.05:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #070.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 4.05:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #070.
original_issue.selector: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(5) > table > thead > tr:nth-child(1) > th > span:nth-child(2)

issues.title: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. As this table has multiple levels of th elements, you must use the headers attribute on td elements.

original_issue.message: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. As this table has multiple levels of th elements, you must use the headers attribute on td elements.

issues.title: Tables do not use `<caption>` instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute to indicate a caption.
issues.description: Screen readers have features to make navigating tables easier. Ensuring that tables use the actual caption element instead of cells with the `[colspan]` attribute may improve the experience for screen reader users. [Learn more about captions](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/table-fake-caption).

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (141.7px by 16px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 22.2px instead of at least 24px.
